title: Couldn't log in, stucking in authenticating
body:
I couldn't log in from this morning, everytime I tried it just stuck in authenticating forever.
Tried everything I could, restarted pc, reinstalled the game, reconnected internet. Nothing worked!
Please help me Rito. BTW I'm lving in orlando FL area. My connections are good.
Thank you so much.

replies.body:
Do you still experience this login issue if you swap your DNS over to Google's using [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)?

Please, let me know!
